Title: Fine-tuning GPT-J for text generation tasks in the Slovak language
Abstract: this paper provides a review of the gpt j demonstration with a specific focus on its fine tuning capabilities for text generation in slovak. through reasoning we explore the model‚äôs fine tuning in tasks such as text generation. we compare the results between different sizes of datasets and different sizes of pre trained models. the results clearly show that the size of the dataset has an impact on the quality of the resulting model.
